### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE risk_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  risk_type VARCHAR(50),
  risk_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE risk_metrics SET risk_value = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;

  risk_type VARCHAR(50),
